content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill is not present but furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Coal mine at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) 

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=1.5), small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=2.5), small electric pole at position(x=4.5, y=5.5), small electric pole at position(x=8.5, y=9.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  No assembling machine or inserter is connected to the furnace

### Lab at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) connected to power network

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventory
-  Make sure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when extracting items from non-existent entities
-  Ensure the entity exists and contains the item before attempting to extract
### Errors when inserting items into incorrect entities
-  Verify the entity type and position before attempting to insert items
### Errors when trying to smelt without ingredients
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to smelt
